# example-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                    | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Whether the input is disabled  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Placeholder text for the input | `string`  | `''`    |
| `value`       | `value`       | The current value of the input | `string`  | `''`    |


## Events

| Event           | Description                           | Type                  |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `exampleBlur`   | Emitted when the input loses focus    | `CustomEvent<void>`   |
| `exampleChange` | Emitted when the value changes        | `CustomEvent<string>` |
| `exampleFocus`  | Emitted when the input receives focus | `CustomEvent<void>`   |
